entries.title: How I learned the hard way about Southwest Airlines' awful technology
entries.description: Was the Southwest debacle "the perfect storm"? No, it was not.

entries.title: I bought Apple's M2 MacBook Air and now I'm weeping
entries.description: I hated myself for wanting one. Then I actually bought one. This is how it feels after almost two months.

entries.title: How to enable the Activity Sharing feature on your Apple Watch
entries.description: Use the Apple Watch activity sharing feature to kick start -- and stick to -- your 2023 fitness goals.
